gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 124, Lakers 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Lakers, 124-108. DeMar DeRozan recorded 27 points, seven rebounds and nine assists for the Bulls, while Coby White added 17 points, seven rebounds and five assists in the victory. LeBron James tallied 25 points, 10 rebounds and nine assists for the Lakers in the losing effort. The Bulls improve to 12-17 on the season, while the Lakers fall to 15-13.
